channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Decoding The Molecular Benefits Of Exercise
item.description: There has always been a dream that there could be a pill to replace exercise. New research suggests a molecule called betaine may do just that.

item.title: The Dental Myths Your Dentist Wants You To Stop Believing

item.title: ‘Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion’ Gets Some Nice Character Trailers
item.description: With the release of 'Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion' looming, we’ve now been graced with some new character trailers.
